lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I study all day.

lender.name: Linda&Mishka
lender.loan_because:
On behalf of myself and my son Mishka, in memory of my son's friend Dylan Hadd, of Montreal Canada. May 30, 1986 - November 16, 2009. Dylan died November 16, age twenty-three, of lymphoma. Dylan had requested that no donations be made in his name to cancer research but rather to kiva.org
I think this is an excellent idea!
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer and journalist with a longstanding interest in social justice, which is hopefully reflected in my work!

lender.name: Kevsmob
lender.loan_because: There is such need, and our gift together with yours can offer a hand up to someone needing one.
lender.occupational_info: A group of friends from church with a common interest.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I I love the concept, It empowers people, and I love empowering people.

lender.name: Cesar
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is in my country. Having lived there half of my childhood, I experienced having money and not having money. Its tough, and there are so many reasons to fall in a trap that you feel you can't get out.
lender.occupational_info: I get to play around by building websites for small businesses. Its fun and creative. I have to put many hats on, but I love the challenge. I also spend a great deal of time building other businesses that I helped start.

lender.name: Lubor
lender.loan_because: I would like to help the others

lender.name: Margarita
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva Gift Certificate from my boss last year as a Christmas gift so. I have loaned in the passed because I have worked in Equador teaching computers to children and adults who own small business as well as Parenting classes in developing rural communities and i saw the difference in quality of life a small amount of money made.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an industry that provides creative solutions to prepaid products that are used for gift giving and funding towards specific products. In other words, Gift Cards Mall

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i clean house

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: Through hard word and perseverance I've managed to make my business blossom. I would like to share this experience with other women around the word.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: There, but by the grace of God, go I.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I hope it will make a difference.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: I received a micro-loan from my American Indian tribe to move to Japan. Without it, I could never have been a teacher here.
lender.occupational_info: We are English teachers. Teachers are examples for everyone, even people who cannot fully understand what we are saying.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: This was originally a class challenge to make the most positive change in the world with $20 and we decided to do Kiva. We were able to get $50 together which we lent to a woman in Samoa. Although I've since made a number of loans with my own money, the original $50 can still be traced through six other borrowers.

lender.name: Ian & Michelle
lender.loan_because: it is good for the soul!!!

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I want to secure a cheque of $500 000 that i have inherited from my late uncle.the loan will help me to pay for the customs at the airport and to pay the diplomatic delivery costs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a young inspirering enterprenuer who is currently trying to develop his own entity in ict sector.ambitius,passionate and self motitated individual.

lender.name: Dagmar
lender.loan_because: I like the idea supporting people who want to do something to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm sitting in front of my three monitors, thinking a lot and typing mysterious things. If it works, what I'm doing, my customers will be pleased in the end.

lender.name: Hudson
lender.occupational_info: I work in a rural community in Guatemala fostering asset-based community development.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: this is a super initiative ! You really see where your money is going to. Super !!

lender.name: Gary
lender.occupational_info:
Wine guy, host of Wine Library TV. Video blogger and Businessman that loves people and the hustle.
Gary Vaynerchuk has captured attention with his pioneering, multi-faceted approach to personal branding and business. After primarily utilizing traditional advertising techniques to build his family’s local retail wine business into a national industry leader, Gary rapidly leveraged social media tools such as Twitter and Facebook to promote Wine Library TV, his video blog about wine. Gary has always had an early to market approach launching Wine Library’s retail website in 1997 and Wine Library TV in February of 2006. Gary’s success has led to a 7-figure book deal, several national TV appearances, and a flurry of speaking engagements around the world. Gary’s dual identity as both business guru and wine guy has made him the “Social Media Sommelier.”

lender.name: Tim
lender.occupation: meat department manager at grocery store

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can.....and hope it makes a difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I support people to become more independent in the things they want to do. This might be activities to look after themselves, work activities or leisure.

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: Bel Fiore Bridal
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have the opportunity to operate a business that we love. Now we want to share our passion for entrepreneurship across the globe. We've established a program whereby we fund our Kiva account every time a bride buys a wedding dress from our bridal salon. We hope the contributions made by our brides will help others realize their hopes and dreams.

lender.occupation: We are middle school students and their supporters

lender.loan_because: I'm saving up to allowance. Could you keep this savings for me?

lender.name: W. Luis Soto
lender.occupation: Student | Private Consultant in Child Development
lender.loan_because:
I know what it feels like to be in need and not have enough. I also understand that the economy needs to be stimulated in America, as well as outside of America, to maintain a healthy free market. So even if I can spend my money I use for "fun" on others who need money to live a better life I will do so. I mean, I think I can survive without some of that junk food I enjoy so much :) if it means putting food into the mouths of others!
Also, check out my description about my work: I have some other reasons why I want to lend in that section too.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a foster child which means that I lived with a family other than my own so that they could take care of me. Also, my state assisted the families to take care of me. Not that my parents do not love me, but they could not have provided my basic needs (like, enough food or other basic needs) when I was younger.
Anyways, I am a student at the local university and work from home to help other foster children by voicing my views on better laws and making better policies that concern children and families. Which is my main reason for lending to you and others in need through Kiva.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I have been helped.
lender.occupational_info: I help others market their services with Radio, TV, Print and Internet.

lender.name: Katariina
lender.loan_because: I respect people who work hard to better the lives of themselves and their families, and wish to give them a better chance.
lender.occupational_info: I assist disabled persons at their work and studies.

lender.name: Steve and Angie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance
lender.occupational_info: we used to work in finance and marketing but are leaving our jobs to go on a grand adventure... Hopefully we'll meet you one day soon...

lender.name: Joe Clark
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am the father of one son, and I have experience in many different walks of life. So I can fully relate to those who want to further their dreams and ambitions. Good luck to you.

lender.name: Joe C
lender.loan_because: My daughter invited me.

lender.name: James Weng
lender.occupational_info: I perform audits of large companies to ensure they are accurately stating their financial results.

lender.name: James N
lender.loan_because: I like to see good people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Google. When you use Google to search for things, there are ads that appear beside the results. I make sure that the computer systems that make these ads possible are working properly. It's a bit like a car mechanic, but for the internet. I also play music in my spare time, which is why my photograph is of me playing the bass guitar. :)

lender.name: Talita
lender.occupation: Student at UFSC / University of Nottingham
lender.loan_because: small actions contribute for big changes. I hope to be able to make bigger contributions in the future, not only by loaning money but also in other ways (which I am still planning).
lender.occupational_info: I study Business Management and plan to start my own business/organisation.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: As a trusted Florida tax attorney, our firm helps people with local and IRS tax problems to reduce their tax debt and resolve their IRS problems.
lender.occupational_info: As a trusted Florida tax attorney, our firm helps people with local and IRS tax problems to reduce their tax debt and resolve their IRS problems.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand sometimes.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed and want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I test people for sleep disorders, like sleep apnea, which is where a person stops breathing while sleeping.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I can some good for people and families who have so little, but struggle on and somehow survive.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: to help others help themselves

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I believe in microloans and the impact they have on the developing world....
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and not a well to do one at all, (just lost my house to forelosure) but I have something to share...

lender.name: Duane
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being a part of someone else's success.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own engineering consultancy company which sometimes makes money and sometimes doesn't.

lender.name: ng
lender.occupation: for now i only help my mom make flowers for dresse
lender.loan_because: i have a son (2yo) and a wife who need to be feed. for now i realy have no more money to eat n start business. i only depend on my mother pity. i wish kiva can make a change for me and my life and my family.
lender.occupational_info: home working.

lender.name: Michael & Nina
lender.loan_because: Alturistic, unselfish concern for the welfare of others.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who have so many more barriers in their lives than I have faced, and because I admire and am humbled by the will and determination needed to carry on in such difficult circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English, writing and reading, to college students.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all children of one God, sons and daughters of one mother Earth, and brothers and sisters, all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a licensed professional counselor supervisor and work at a counseling agency in Fairbanks, Alaska.

lender.name: Carolese
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others as much as I can. I hope to loan much more in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time internet marketer which means I do make money working exclusively online.

lender.name: Olaf
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Ilona
lender.loan_because: I want to help in a smart way.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business travel industry and manage all of the European countries in our company.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: once I had been unemployed and later an independet businessman and believe me there always where periods I very much appreciated financial help. I am still grateful to friends who helped me!
lender.occupational_info: Now I am a retired man very much enjoying to be with my family and grad children, however I am enjoying very much my activities working online, meeting people and trying to make some "pocket money"

lender.name: Eamonn
lender.loan_because: I have it easy in life compared to most of humanity.
lender.occupational_info: Maritime operations management
